data.text: @denijeg I never heard of it referred to that way. Bats and pangolins.
@denijeg Yeah, the Iranian virus that entered Lebanon via a cardinal who had been at the Vatican....

She seized the fears many people had at the beginning of the pandemic to blame Lebanon’s Shiite population & Iran. Shia were “more exposed to the virus coming straight from Iran”. “In fact, [the virus] started in China, Iran and Hezbollah’s ally.” 🤦🏽‍♂️ https://t.co/J12u1B9hGo
